description: In the first scene, Lucas and his assistant, Mitch Ryder, hold a "casting couch" audition for blond Aussie, Todd Willard. Lucas and Ryder put Willard through the paces as he tops Ryder then lets Ryder and Lucas fuck his round little butt. After Williard leaves, we discover that Lucas had already finished casting his new film before Willard even arrived.
title: Michael Lucas, Mitch Ryder, and Todd Willard
